dtliExcerpt: The new Annie is a handsome production that benefits from strong performances and slick staging, but it lacks the scrappy charm that made the original so endearing.

wrongFullText:
Glee star Jenna Ushkowitz will pen her first book, Choosing Glee, according to The Hollywood Reporter. The book will be published in Spring 2013.

The book will explore the actress’ life, from her adoption by a Long Island family to her appearance on Broadway in The King and I and Spring Awakening and her work on the acclaimed Fox musical comedy series, in which she plays Tina Chang.
